spec_data.Name: perl-Term-ANSIColor
spec_data.Description:
This module has two interfaces, one through color() and colored() and the
other through constants. It also offers the utility functions uncolor(),
colorstrip(), colorvalid(), and coloralias(), which have to be explicitly
imported to be used.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:27:39 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Color screen output using ANSI escape sequences
